item.description:
Happy November everyone!
Our December Brunch will be on the 5th. Cole Farms it is.

http://colefarms.com/...

They only take cash or checks, but there is an ATM there.

I called and they will accomodate a large group if I let them know on Saturday what time we will be meeting on Sunday and how many.


Driving Instructions to Cole Farms Restaurant and Spring Meadows Golf & Country Club

Just 1 mile from Exit 63 off the Maine Turnpike in Gray, Maine, Cole Farms Restaurant and Spring Meadows Golf and Country Club are conveniently located between Portland and the Lewiston-Auburn area.


From Bethel/Oxford: Take Rte. 26 south into Gray. Take 4/100/202 north. Cole Farms Restaurant is 1 mile on your right. Spring Meadows Golf and Country Club is on your left.

From Lewiston/Auburn: Take Rte. 4/100/202 south toward Gray. Cole Farms Restaurant is on your left. Spring Meadows Golf and Country Club is on your right.

From Sebago Lakes Area: Take 202/115 north. Go across I-95. Take 100/202 north 1 mi. Cole Farms Restaurant is on your right. Spring Meadows Golf and Country Club is on your left.

From Portland: Take I-95 north to exit 63. Take a right. Follow 4/100/202 north bound. Cole Farms Restaurant is 1 mi. on your right. Spring Meadows Golf and Country Club is on your left.

From Freeport/Yarmouth: Take Rte. 115 west into Gray. Take 4/100/202 north 1 mi. Cole Farms Restaurant is on your right. Spring Meadows Golf and Country Club is on your left.
item.name: December Brunch
